statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_duration > 60;
SELECT MAX(activity_duration) FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM user_activity;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_duration FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Running' ORDER BY activity_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, SUM(activity_duration) AS total_duration FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id, activity_type;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, activity_duration FROM user_activity WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id, activity_timestamp;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_duration FROM user_activity WHERE activity_duration > 30 AND activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity
SELECT user_id, activity_date, activity_type, duration_minutes FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT user_id, activity_type, duration_minutes FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT * FROM usage_based_pricing ORDER BY usage_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, activity_type, duration_minutes FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date = '2022-01-05';
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC, duration_minutes ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, duration_minutes FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activity;
SELECT u.user_id, u.usage_date, u.usage_amount, ua.activity_type FROM usage_based_pricing u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id ORDER BY u.usage_date DESC, ua.activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, subscription_type FROM users WHERE subscription_type = 'premium';
SELECT user_name, onboarding_date FROM users ORDER BY onboarding_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, plan_name, base_price FROM users JOIN pricing_plans ON users.user_id = pricing_plans.plan_id ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_name, onboarding_date FROM users ORDER BY onboarding_date DESC;

SELECT u.user_name, a.activity_date, a.activity_description FROM users u JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY a.activity_date ASC;
SELECT u.user_name, p.plan_name, p.base_price FROM users u JOIN pricing_plans p ON u.subscription_type = p.plan_name WHERE p.base_price > 100;
SELECT u.user_name, COUNT(a.activity_id) AS activity_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.user_name HAVING activity_count > 5 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT user_id, company_name FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2021-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2021-03-31';
SELECT user_id, pricing_date, usage_cost FROM pricing WHERE usage_cost > 100.00 ORDER BY pricing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, company_name FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_date, ua.activity_description FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id;
SELECT users.username, usage_logs.log_date, pricing.usage_cost FROM users JOIN usage_logs ON users.user_id = usage_logs.user_id JOIN pricing ON users.user_id = pricing.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT plan_name, plan_price FROM pricing_plans WHERE plan_price > 50;
SELECT user_id, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM usage_records GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT u.user_name, r.usage_date, p.plan_name FROM users u INNER JOIN usage_records r ON u.user_id = r.user_id INNER JOIN pricing_plans p ON u.user_id = p.plan_id WHERE r.usage_amount > 100;
SELECT u.user_name, b.bill_amount, b.bill_date FROM users u INNER JOIN billing b ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.bill_amount > 200 ORDER BY b.bill_date ASC;
SELECT u.user_name, a.activity_type, a.activity_timestamp FROM users u INNER JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2024-01-01' AND '2024-12-31';
